entry.title: Wednesday: Mainly sunny. High minus 7.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Fog patches dissipating near noon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 7. Wind chill minus 17 this morning and minus 12 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Wednesday 04 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 17.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Fog patches developing this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 17. Wind chill minus 12 this evening and minus 21 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Wednesday 04 January 2023
